text: The 11 Uzhavar Santhais in the district, including four in the Corporation limits, registered sale of vegetables to the tune of Rs. 64.75 lakh on the ‘Margazhi amavasai’ on Saturday. A total of 1,134 farmers from the villages brought about 200 tonnes of vegetables to the santhais. About 43,000 people visited these santhais.
title: Brisk sales at Uzhavar Santhais
